files.duplicate: you have already uploaded a file with this name
files.uploadMax: you can upload a maximum of {n} file | You can upload a maximum of {n} files
hinting.reference.glyphs.slash: You can reference glyphs by prepending them with a slash, like so /A or /A.ss01
discover.copy: Explore discourses on type and discover a new way to delve into the world of typography, one character at a time
discuss.copy: On Character Diversion discourse is based on the things you actually talk about: characters. You can attache your opinions to certain characters, parts of characters and spectra in the design space of variable fonts.
diverge.copy: Users will be able to contribute to a type design discourse by actually proposing a diverting letter shape, posting it, and then giving users the ability to view the different options.
title: Title
describe.discourse: Give a brief account of what you want to discuss.
describe.opinion: Voice your opinion and link the glyphs you are referencing by prepending a slash (/A) or by selecting them.
vote.not.allowed: You are not allowed to vote on your own opinions.
hero.copy: Everyone has an opinion on type. It's time to share yours.
hero.subcopy: Designers and foundries explore, discuss, and work on their typefaces on Character Diversionâ€”the most adequate platform for typographic discourse in the world.
